attributes.action: Ignore and oppose the petition created by Tina Reeves. Terrorism has no religion
attributes.additional_details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107516
Unlike Tina Reeves, I shan't source tabloid headlines as fact. 
Not all Muslims are terrorists. 
Not all terrorists are Muslim. 
Terrorism has no religion.
attributes.background: In response to the attacks in France, Tina Reeves started the petition "Stop all immigration and close the UK borders until ISIS is defeated." based on nothing but fear and the false assumption that all terrorist attacks came from Islam. As the only way to oppose is by counter petition, this exists.
